item.title: Clap Your Hands Say Yeah (Hljóð (mp3/ogg))
item.description:
Hér er á ferðinni fyrsti diskur Clap Your Hands Say Yeah. Diskurinn kom út á síðasta ári og hefur fengið mikið lof frá bæði gagnrýnendum sem og "venjulegum" hlustendum.
Hljómsveitin spilar einhverskonar Indie Rokk og það af bestu gerð. Diskurinn er þrælmagnaður og eftir nokkrar hlustanir er maður farinn að syngja með flestum lögunum. Þau eru þó nokkuð hress flest hver og röddin í söngvaranum Alec Ounsworth er einstök! Á þannig hátt að annaðhvort hatar fólk eða elskar hana. Ef þú tilheyrir seinni hópnum áttu líklega eftir að fíla þessa plötu í tætlur þar sem honum tekst að þenja röddina í allar áttir og leika sér með hana á skemmtilegan hátt. Allur hljóðfæraleikur er einnig mjög skemmtilegur og mörg lögin eru mjög grípandi.
Lagalistinn er svona:
"Clap Your Hands!" – 1:48 "Let the Cool Goddess Rust Away" – 3:24 "Over and Over Again (Lost and Found)" – 3:09 "Sunshine and Clouds (And Everything Proud)" – 1:02 "Details of the War" – 3:30 "The Skin of My Yellow Country Teeth" – 5:43 "Is This Love?" – 3:11 "Heavy Metal" – 4:01 "Blue Turning Gray" – 1:17 "In This Home on Ice" – 3:58 "Gimmie Some Salt" – 3:03 "Upon This Tidal Wave of Young Blood" – 4:34
Svo skulum við hafa dóm af rjominn.is hérna í lokin (en hann fékk 4 af 5 mögulegum þaðan í einkunn!) http://rjominn.is/reviews/show/47

item.title: Mahou Sensei Negima (Negima, Magic teacher Negima) (Anime/Manga)
item.description: Title: Mahou Sensei Negima! English: Magic Teacher Negima! Synonyms: Magic Teacher Negima, Magister Negi Magi, Mahou Sensei Negima Short: msn, negi, negima Genre: Comedy, Ecchi, Magic, School, ShounenCategories Type: TV Episodes: 26 Year: 2005 (06.01.2005 till 30.06.2005) Companies: Akamatsu Ken (XEBEC) URL: http://www.negima.ne.jp/ ANN: ID: 4380 Animenfo: ID: 1654,wqyuag Allcinema: ID: 321609 [url=http://anidb.info/][img]http://img4.anidb.info/pics/anime/4738.jpg[/img][/url] After graduated from a magic academy, 10-year-old genius boy Negi Springfield was assigned to a huge Japanese school as an English teacher for practical training. To his surprise, the 8th grade class assigned for him is all-girl. In addition to teaching (and being teased by) those 31 pretty girls while trying to keep his magic capability in secret, he`s also looking for clues about his father, who was once known as the greatest Magus but mysteriously disappeared years ago.. þetta eru geggjaðir þættir mæli hiklaust með þeim :D

item.title: Kaspersky® Internet Security 6.0 [$95.92] (Forrit)
item.description:
[b]Kaspersky Internet Security 6.0[/b] – a fully integrated solution -- combines reactive detection methods with the latest proactive technologies, protecting your PC from viruses, hacker attacks, adware, spam and spyware. Seamless integration of all product components eliminates system conflicts and provides fast performance. [img=http://www.tomshardware.pl/technews/images/20060113-KIS6_0.jpg] ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b]Key Features[/b] [b]Protection from viruses[/b]
*
Email protection. The program scans email traffic for viruses according to the protocol via which it is sent (POP3, IMAP and NNTP for incoming mail and SMTP for outgoing mail) on any mail program. We also offer plug-ins and treatment for viruses in Microsoft Outlook and Microsoft Outlook Express mail databases. *
Scanning of Internet traffic. All HTTP Internet traffic is scanned for viruses in real-time, ensuring that infected objects are not saved to the computer’s hard disk. Statistics about harmful scripts can be accessed using a plug-in for Microsoft Internet Explorer. *
File system protection. Individual files, catalogues and disks can be designated for antivirus scanning. Users can limit antivirus scanning to critical areas of the operating system and startup objects to ensure that attention is focused on the most vulnerable areas of the system. *
Proactive protection. Kaspersky Internet Security monitors program activity and all processes launched in RAM. It notifies users of dangerous, suspicious or hidden processes (that is, rootkits), prevents harmful changes to the file system and restores the system after malicious activity.
[b]Protection from spyware[/b]
*
Secures confidential information. The program prevents confidential information (such as passwords, bank account numbers and credit card details) being stolen from your computer. It detects phishing messages and disables links to phishing sites. *
Safe Internet surfing. The program prevents dangerous scripts from being launched on websites, and blocks popup windows and advertising banners. *
Blocks automatic dial up programs. Any unauthorized attempts to dial up premium-rate telephone services from your modem are blocked.
[b]Protection from hackers[/b]
*
Blocks network attacks. Intrusion detection system monitors any network activity that has the characteristics of a hacker attack. The program prevents hacker attacks by blocking connections from the hacker’s computer. *
Full control over network activity. The program controls all requests from applications to websites, in accordance with the program rules that have been set, and tracks all incoming and outgoing data packages. *
Safety on all networks. When a computer connects to a network, the program asks you to specify the type of network (a trusted network, Intranet or the Internet), so that the firewall can choose how strict the rules should be. *
Stealth mode. This technology makes the computer invisible to outside users, effectively preventing all types of DoS (Denial of Service) attacks.
[b]Protection from spam[/b]
*
Integrated protection from spam. Several methods are used in combination to ensure the highest possible level of spam detection, including blacklists and whitelists of IP addresses and word combinations typical of spam together with self-learning algorithms. The program also scans graphic images for spam attributes. *
Support for common mail programs. An expansion module, specifically designed for Microsoft Outlook and Microsoft Outlook Express, enables you to set processing rules for messages according to their post-analysis status. *
Preliminary analysis of messages. To economize time and network traffic, the Mail Manager conducts preliminary analyses of message headings in all incoming email before downloading them from the mail server. This also reduces the risk of spam and viruses being downloaded to your computer. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b]Njótið Vel![/b]

item.title: Block.Party.UNRATED.DVDRip.XViD-NeDiVx (Video (60+ mín))
item.description:
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0425598/
Dave Chappelle's Block Party spotlights comedy superstar Dave Chappelle as he presents a Brooklyn neighborhood with its very own once-in-a-lifetime free block party. The unprecedented combination of comedy and music was shot on location. In addition to Mr. Chappelle performing all-new material, the stellar roster of artists includes Kanye West, Mos Def, Talib Kweli, Common, Dead Prez, Erykah Badu, Jill Scott, the Roots, Cody ChesnuTT, Big Daddy Kane, and - reunited for their first performance in over seven years - the Fugees. In Ohio, Mr. Chappelle wandered through town handing out golden tickets to invite several dozen citizens to join the party, providing transportation and lodging for their first-time-ever visit to Brooklyn. Ohio's Central State University marching band made the trip and helped kick off the festivities at the intersection of Quincy and Downing Streets. As a diverse crowd comes together, Mr. Chappelle's freestyle wit guides them (and us) through a day-long, life-affirming celebration of music and comedy, history and community. The lineup of performers is distinguished not only by the caliber of their music but also by the strength and power that their art draws from keeping their creativity pure.
Credited cast: Dave Chappelle .... Himself/Host Erykah Badu .... Herself Bilal .... Himself Lil' Cease .... Himself Cody Chestnutt .... Himself (as Cody ChesnuTT) Common .... Himself Mos Def .... Himself Freeway .... Himself James 'Kamal' Gray .... Himself (as The Roots) Fred Hampton Jr. .... Himself Lauryn Hill .... Herself (as The Fugees) Leonard 'Hub' Hubbard .... Himself (as The Roots) Darren Hymes .... Himself Wyclef Jean .... Himself (as The Fugees) Big Daddy Kane .... Himself Talib Kweli .... Himself John Legend .... Himself Tiffany Limos .... Herself Pras .... Himself (as The Fugees) Dead Prez .... Themselves Kool G. Rap .... Himself Jill Scott .... Herself Ahmir-Khalib Thompson .... Himself (as The Roots) Tariq Trotter .... Himself (as The Roots) Kanye West .... Himself (more)
Tagline: You're invited to the party of the decade!

item.title: Graffiti Myndbönd (Video (60+ mín))
item.description:
Ég ákvað að senda inn graffiti mynda safnið mitt... :) Myndirnar eru eftirfarandi :
Area 08 Dirty Hands 1 Men in Black 3 Pure Hate State Your Name Style Wars Write and Unite
allt Mjög góðar myndir ! en mínar uppáhalds eru Style Wars og Write and Unite -----
[b]Area 08[/b]
cover: [img]http://www.positivos.com/tienda/images/grandes/0011.jpg[/img]
----
[b]Men in Black 3[/b]
cover: [img]http://www.bombingscience.com/images/video-meninblack3-1.jpg[/img]
60 min. The third M.I.B. DVD is as nasty as the previous releases. If you are not familiar with this DVD serie from Poland, here is the kind of things you should expect to see in this movie: terrorist-looking guys blocking trains, pulling the emergency brakes each time the train is trying to leave the station, until the bombers have finished their wholecar. Sounds hardcore to you? It is... All this DVD is about live hardcore action. Follow the guys in whole-trains mission, see insides get destroyed and other crazy scenes. Already a classic of vandal graff movies! [url=http://www.bombingscience.com/catalog.htm?item=1006&ret=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.bombingscience.com%2Fcatalog.htm%3Fpage%3D1%26category%3DVideos]LINK[/url]
Price: $21.95
----
[b]Pure Hate[/b]
The ruffest underground graffiti video ever made. PUREHATE Due to professional camera work and postproduction a new era of graffiti video has begun. Night and day, wholecars or END2END - get involved when Berlins craziest aerosol junkies visit their iron babys and you are online a breathe away - the camera follows nearby.
PUREHATE is an explosive mixture of Berlins graffiti scene and shows 70 minutes of the hardest action ever caught on tape. See the cream of the writers scene of Germanys capitol in action! This masterpiece of underground graffiti video sets new standards and will definetely kick your ass!
[url=http://www.purehate.info/video.html]LINK[/url]
----
[b]State Your Name[/b]
cover: [img]http://www.bombingscience.com/images/video-stateyourname-1.jpg[/img]
120 minutes- This is probably the most hyped graffiti DVD to come out in many years. So yeah, the wait is over and the result is definitely a really good DVD on the NYC street bombing scene. It's a 2 hours long video, packed with live bombing footage and interviews with the Big Apple kings. Some of the writers featured: Noxer, Skuf, Kez5, Risk9, Menos, Cope2, Jest, Yes2, Ces, Goal, Sast, Ket, Ja...
Price: $23.95
[url=http://www.bombingscience.com/catalog.htm?item=1256]LINK[/url]
----
[b]Style Wars[/b]
[img]http://images.amazon.com/images/P/B00008MTWY.01.LZZZZZZZ.jpg[/img]
Genre: Documentary
User Comments: The 'King' of Graffiti cinema. (more)
User Rating: 8.2/10 (273 votes)
Credited cast: Cap .... Himself Daze .... Himself Dondi .... Himself Frosty Freeze .... Himself Kase 2 .... Himself Edward I. Koch .... Himself Crazy Legs .... Himself Mare .... Himself Min One .... Himself Seen .... Himself Skeme .... Himself Iz the Whiz .... Himself (more)
Runtime: Canada:69 min Country: USA Language: English
Quotes: Seen: I can't afford to get involved. There's a war going on as you should know. PJ and Cap against everybody
IMDB: [url=http://imdb.com/title/tt0177262/]LINK[/url] Heimasíða:[url=http://www.stylewars.com/]LINK[/url] [b]besta graff mynd sem ég hef séð, get horft á hana aftur og aftur og aftur ![/b]
----
[b]Write and Unite[/b]
[img]http://www.garagemagazine.net/img/writeunite-cover.jpg[/img]
"Write and Unite" presents the world's greatest graffitti artists live in action. From subways to huge productions, street bombing to organized events, never before has there been such a complete, global documentation of today's top aerosolists and their work.
INCLUDING ARTISTS: ATOM, CAP, CODEROCK, COPE2, DASH167, DENZ, FX CREW, GOAL, GREY, JUST195, KACAO77, KENT, MAC CREW, MEAR, MOAS CREW, RISKY, SABE, SABER, SEEN, SKETCH, SMASH, SWET, TKID, TOOMER, ZEBSTER, AND MANY, MANY MORE.
WITH CHAPTERS OF: BOMBING DANISH TRAINS LOS ANGELES WALL STREET MEETINGS NIGHT MISSIONS NEW YORK CITY ATHENS DANISH WALLS MONTANA TOUR 2001 MIAMI PARIS HELSINKI GALLERY ART SABER INTERVIEW TIJUANA
[url=http://www.writeandunite.com/]LINK[/url]
----
Erfitt að finna upplýsingar um sumar þessara mynda, en mér tókst það með flestum... Vonadni downloadiði og njótiði.. Mjög Góðar Myndir... !

item.title: Kerio Personal Firewall 4.2 (Forrit)
item.description:
[b]Kerio Personal Firewall 4.2 [$45.00][/b] ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Kerio Personal Firewall (KPF) helps users control how their computers exchange data with other computers on the Internet or local network.
Kerio Personal Firewall is a necessity for all desktop computers connected to broadband Internet, using DSL, cable, ISDN, WiFi or satellite modems.
Within an organization, Kerio Personal Firewall prevents a single computer from attacks initiated by internal users. Remote workstations and laptops running KPF are protected from Internet born attacks. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ [b]Njótið Vel![/b]

item.title: Trigun(Allir Þættirnir) (Anime/Manga)
item.description:
Trigun (トライガン, Toraigan?) is a sci-fi manga series with a steampunk Wild West theme created by Yasuhiro Nightow in 1995, and adapted into a 26 episode anime series in 1998 by Madhouse. It is the story of Vash the Stampede, a.k.a. The Humanoid Typhoon, a person with a $$60,000,000,000 bounty on his head, and the two Bernardelli Insurance Society employees, Meryl Stryfe and Milly Thompson, who were ordered to follow him and minimize the damage that seems to follow Vash everywhere he goes. Like Himura Kenshin from the manga/anime series Rurouni Kenshin, Vash can almost appear to have two personalities — that of a harmless idiot and that of an unstoppable warrior -- but is always staunchly pacifist.
[url]http://www.yale.edu/anime/imgarchive/Trigun/vash-is-wanted.jpg[/url] [url]http://www.northarc.com/images/trigun/trigun007_copy_2.jpg[/url]
